## Embeddable.getRoot() method

Returns the top most parent embeddable, or itself if this embeddable is not within a parent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRoot(): IEmbeddable | IContainer;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`IEmbeddable | IContainer`
